summary: This document consists of Bureau of Prisons administrative forms from the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York, dated August 9-10, 2019. It includes a count sheet, an out-count form, an inmate roster, and multiple official count slips, recording inmate population counts and staff assignments. The documents appear to be routine prison operational records from the time Jeffrey Epstein was incarcerated there before his death.

persons.name: Bullock

events.title: Inmate Roster and Assignments
events.description: Administrative record showing inmate assignments, including several inmates on suicide watch.

events.title: Official Inmate Count
events.description: Bureau of Prisons count sheet recording a total inmate census of 758 at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, NY
keyFacts: The documents are dated August 9-10, 2019, which is the period immediately preceding Jeffrey Epstein's death on August 10, 2019.
An inmate roster from August 9, 2019, lists four inmates (Bullock, Decapua, Gama-Pineda, McDuffie) with 'SUICIDE OR' (suicide watch) designations.
A count sheet from August 10, 2019, records a total inmate population of 758 at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York.
The documents are standard Bureau of Prisons administrative forms for inmate counts, assignments, and out-counts.
The records show the routine operational procedures in place at the facility during the time Epstein was held there.
